value: is situated about 30 km from Darjeeling. The small place is an important traffic junction in South Sikkim. There are daily busses to Siliguri at 8am, Gangtok at 7.30am, Namchi at 8.30am and Pelling at 3pm. There are shared jeeps to Darjeeling (25 km, INR 100), Namchi (1 hr, INR 25) and Leghsip (1 hr) where you have to change cars for Ravangla, Yoksum and Tashiding, as well as to Gangtok (4 to 5 hrs, INR 100) and Silguri (4 to 5 hrs, INR 100). Most shared jeeps leave Jorethang earlier than 1 pm.
